timeline.message:
Add method copyFile() to IBasicFileSystem

- Implement copyFile() method in all known FileSystems, except for ftp
- Add action 'çopy' to FileSystemActor (and FileSystemPipe and -Sender)
- Add attribute 'logFolder' to FileSystemListener
Add attribute destination to FileSystemActor, -Sender and -Pipe

timeline.bodyText: Wat als deze leeg is? Kan je niet beter NULL teruggeven?

timeline.message: return null if ParameterValue not found in FileSystemActor
